features: 【MOTION SENSOR & HAND WAVE SENSOR】OWOZEEN under cabinet lights motion sensor now feature two types of sensors. AUTO mode, these closet lights motion sensored are equipped with a PIR sensor that automatically turns on when it detects movement within a range of 10ft/120°. After no motion is detected for approximately 20 seconds, the cabine lights will turn off. With the hand wave sensor activated, it will light for 180s before turning off. Then it will automatically enter motion sensor mode.

【3 COLOR TEMPERATURES & STEPLESS DIMMING】One-button control the motion sensor cabinet light that allows you to effortlessly navigate between 3 different color temperatures and achieve stepless dimming. Short press to choose between warm white (3000K), daylight white (4000K), and cool white (6000K) color temperatures. Long press to smoothly adjust the brightness from 10% to 100%(with 138 LEDs per light, delivering up to 400 lumens of brightness, brighter but not dazzling).

【3000mAh CLOSET LIGHTS BATTERY OPERATED】This rechargeable magnetic light bar is equipped with a built-in 3000mAh battery. It can be conveniently charged via the USB-C connector. Only 7-8 hours for fully charged. In "ON" mode, it can last approximately 8-10 hours, while in "AUTO" mode, it can last for about 1-3 months. The battery lights for closet display a red light while charging and a green light when fully charged.

【WIDE DETECTION RANGE AND HIGH-QUALITY LIGHTING EFFECT】The under cabinet lighting offers a wide detection range, covering a 120-degree angle and reaching a distance of 3 meters. This extensive range ensures that the light effectively detects movement and provides illumination where needed. With its high-quality lighting effect, it is suitable for various spaces such as rooms, cabinets, or any other areas that require illumination.

【EASY TO INSTALL & WIDE APPLICATION】With the built-in strong magnet, the magnetic led light bar can be easily attached to any iron surface. Alternatively, you can use the provided iron brackets with adhesives to securely fix the sensor light in any other location, such as under counter lights for kitchen, cabinets, wardrobes, bedrooms, baby rooms, closets, corridors, workshops, basements, garages, stairwells. Have any questiones about the under cabinet lights, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: New Upgraded Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Light Hand Wave Sensor Light Brightness Adjustable: Support 10% to 100% dimming.3 Color Tempus: Warm light(3000K), Natural Light (4000K), Bright white (6000K).3000mAh Rechargeable Battery: Larger battery capacity, longer lifespan. Charging time takes 6-8 hours.Stick on Anywhere: Using the magnetic back design, can stick on any iron product.Wide Applications: Ideal for cabinets, closets, basements, stairwells, indoor garages, and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really love these lights. They are awesome and work great. I love the hand wave feature to turn them on or off. Even in motion mode you can still use the hand wave feature. Nice brightness, very easy to install, and very strong and sturdy. Very good quality. For charging I recommend charging them at night while your sleeping or during the day. They do take a few hours to charge. Highly recommend these lights for anyone who is looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: . Trying to illuminate a clothes closet. The light is adjustable for tint and brightness, and it is simple to charge and install. I luv this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love Features, Brightness Not So Much
reviews.reviewText: Packaging is good. Features described work well. I like that it has a hand wave that will turn them on even in lit conditions. (Some will not light in auto if more than 10 lux). I like the three color modes and the variability control of the brightness. Also, the USB-C charging is a plus. However, max brightness is claimed to be 400 lumens, but both were not even close. Maybe they mean both lights together is 400 lumens, but even with both lighting at the same time, not bright enough for my pantry. (I have found other magnetic light bars to be able to light up the same area with a single device, even some shorter in length). If you don’t need a lot of light, and the other features look good, should work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MOTION activated! Just WAVE!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My husband liked these in the kitchen so much that we got some for the bathrooms (less "things to do" which can awaken our brains during a middle of the night trip to the bathroom).I ordered extras to have charged-up & ready to go when the light begins to dim on the ones already charged & working".Choosing the Brightness/"color" of the white light is easily changed using the black button near the clear light sensor.Installation is easy:- - 1) Charge up the light strip(s)s)- - 2) Place the MAGNETIC PADS to the designated area ***ONTO THE LIGHT STRIP***WITH THE PROTECTIVE PAPER STILL ON- - 3) SELECT your preferred locationTurn the light strip ONAt the left EDGE,to the left of the large, clear, light sensor "button", is a recessed toggle switchOff - (always) On - AutoToggle to your preferred selection-- 4) Choose your preferred "color" of light (all are white) using the black button/tab beside the large white motion sensor, on the top of the strip.-- 6) Choose the location-- 7) Remove the protective paper from the magnetic brackets-- 8) Place the light strip- To turn ON/OFF (using the "AUTO" selection)Just walk by or wave your hand under/near the light sensor (large clear plastic "bump" near the black button for changing the "color" of the white light).Forget about turning on the overhead light, unless that is your preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars wuality control issues
reviews.reviewText: I bought a set of 2 lamps. The motion detector for one works well and the other simple does not. I swapped out the units with each other and the same one works well in both spots and the other works poorly in both spots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are pretty terrible. I have a set marked at a lower lumen rating, that are significantly brighter. Furthermore, the motion sensor is not very responsive and one has to wave a hand in front of it to activate. The other strips I mentioned would switch on if it caught movement across a room. Don't waste your money.
